title: Hextech Boxes for Friends not working
body:
hello

I've been getting S on 3 of my champions and received the hextech boxes but my wife who I play every game with has not received the boxes. 

- She has not received any boxes this month at all
- I've received 3 boxes
- we are on each others friends list
- we played premade matches together

replies.body:
yeah, she usually plays Teeemo. 

I'm playing a new champ tho, does what she play effect it?

Hey there,

Has your wife already earnt a chest for the champions she's been playing during this season at all?

>Once you earn a chest from achieving S rank on a champion, you won’t be able to earn another with that champion until the end of the season. You can see which champions you’ve earned chests with in your profile’s Champions tab. This chest cap resets each season.
